We send you this email to inform you that we wish to cooperate with you about displaying Google AdSense Premium ads on your site.

What is Google adsense premium ?

Google adsense premium which is a project of AdOnly was signed by us with advertising partners - Google adsense in Vietnam. Before that, in Vietnam, we have cooperated with more than 500 websites to bring the highest income to them. Now we are so delighted to know that we have had able to work with all publishers and any website in the world to bring the best thing to serve them.

The benefits you receive:

- The Google Adsense Premium ad allows to display on almost all websites. However, your site must have at least 5,000 traffic each day or greater than 10,000 pageviews per day.

- Google Adsense Premium ad to help increase maximum revenue in range of 10 to 100 percent compared with normal Google Adsense account.

- Using directly the ads tags by Google Adsense.

- Putting up to 5 banners on a website without violating any provisions, which helps you get the maximum income.

- The statistics will be reported in detail daily, monthly and quarterly, then send you via email by Google.

- Guarantee 100% that you will receive income ( Net 30 ) through PayPal, Payza and Payoneer with 60% revenue share.
